title: Super Quick Creamy Chicken Pasta
description: A super quick and easy creamy chicken pasta recipe the whole family will love. Add veggies like spinach or broccoli for extra nutrition.
steps: Cook pasta until al dente.
Season chicken and cook in a pan until browned.
Add garlic and cook for a minute.
Pour cream and add parmesan, stirring until sauce thickens.
Combine pasta and sauce, season to taste.

title: How to make Pancakes | Fluffy Pancake Recipe
description: Learn how to make soft and fluffy pancakes using simple kitchen staples.
steps: Mix dry ingredients together.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter until batter is smooth.
Heat a griddle or pan and grease lightly.
Pour batter, cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden.
Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.

title: Tuscan-inspired Chicken Pasta
description: An easy Tuscan-style chicken pasta with a rich, creamy tomato sauce.
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Sauté chicken until golden, set aside.
Cook onion & garlic until soft.
Add tomato sauce and cream; simmer.
Stir in spinach until wilted.
Add chicken back in and combine with pasta; season to taste.

title: Creamy Cajun Chicken Pasta
description: Spiced Cajun chicken with creamy pasta – big flavor in one dish.
steps: Season chicken with Cajun seasoning and cook until browned.
Cook pasta until al dente, then drain.
Make sauce: melt butter, cook garlic, add cream and parmesan.
Add chicken and pasta to sauce, stir to coat.
Adjust seasoning and serve.

title: Creamy Garlic Chicken Pasta | 20 Minute Dinner Ideas
description: A fast garlic chicken pasta that you can whip up in 20 minutes — great for quick dinners.
steps: Cook pasta until al dente.
Season and cook chicken until done.
Cook garlic in oil until fragrant.
Add cream and cheese, stir to make sauce.
Combine pasta and chicken with the sauce.
Serve with extra parmesan and garnish.

title: The Best Scrambled Eggs You'll Ever Make
description: Professional tips to make soft, fluffy scrambled eggs.
steps: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk with salt, pepper, and optional milk/cream.
Heat a pan with butter over medium-low heat.
Pour in egg mixture and let set slightly.
Stir slowly and gently to form large soft curds.
Remove from heat just before fully cooked—they will continue cooking slightly.
Serve immediately.

title: How to Make the Perfect Bowl of Porridge
description: A comforting porridge, easy to digest, great for breakfast or anytime.
steps: Combine oats and liquid in a pot.
Bring to a simmer while stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat and cook until oats are soft and creamy.
Season with salt and add sweetener or fruit if desired.
Serve hot.

title: Silky, Savory Chinese Rice Porridge (Congee)
description: Comforting congee, easy to eat and digest, with mild flavors.
steps: Rinse rice and add to pot with lots of liquid.
Bring to boil, then reduce to simmer, stirring occasionally.
Cook until rice breaks down and mixture becomes creamy.
Add ginger or scallions if using.
Add optional protein like shredded chicken or egg towards end.
Adjust salt; serve warm.

title: How To Make Scrambled Eggs | Best Scrambled Eggs Recipe
description: Detailed method to cook soft, velvety scrambled eggs.
steps: Crack eggs and beat lightly with salt, pepper, and optional milk/cream.
Preheat pan with butter over medium-low heat.
Add egg mixture; let sit briefly until edges just begin to set.
Gently stir from edges to center, forming soft curds.
Remove from heat just before they’re fully set.
Serve immediately.

title: How To Make Porridge | Best Uji Recipe
description: Fermented porridge (Uji) – simple, traditional and easily digestible.
steps: Mix flour with a little cold water to make a paste.
Boil water separately, then add paste while stirring to avoid lumps.
Reduce heat and stir continuously until thickened.
Let simmer on low heat for a short time.
Sweeten if desired, then serve warm.

title: 4 Quick & Easy PORRIDGE for Breakfast (4 ways)
description: Four variations of porridge for different tastes — soft, hearty and nutritious.
steps: Prepare base porridge (oats + liquid).
Cook until desired consistency.
Portion into bowls.
Add toppings like fruit or nuts.
Serve while warm.
